title: Holt and Brown on free people of color - evidence

content.question: Which of the following is a piece of evidence used to support Holt and Brown’s argument about the ability of African Americans to “build viable communities and institutions”?

choices.label: Free African Americans lived in a society organized around racial slavery.
Many free African Americans faced oppression in the United States.
Some free African Americans desired to emigrate to a more hospitable place.
Most African Americans devoted their energies to advancing the race.

content.answer: Most African Americans devoted their energies to advancing the race.

topic.text: 2.18: Debates About Emigration, Colonization, and Belonging in America

skill.text: 2.A: Identify and explain a source's claim(s), evidence, and reasoning.
